item.description:
Joyce Andersen has made her way from side-gal gigs in country, folk and bluegrass bands, a celtic band that played Carnegie Hall, a rock band on the Conan O'Brien Show, Irish fiddle sessions and a gypsy jazz band, through countless collaborations and studio sessions to center stage as a powerful singer, creator and instrumentalist.

After four solo singer-songwriter albums and four acoustic folk collaborations with Harvey Reid, she now is re-inventing herself as an "electro-acoustic fiddle troubadour" and has created an exciting new body of new music for solo violin and voice. The Wire NH said her new solo CD will "forever alter your perception of the violin."

The Portsmouth Herald called her a "folk/roots inspired songstress on one side, psychedelic shape-shifter on the other." Whatever you call it, Joyce is definitely finding her own musical path, literally dancing with all four limbs as she takes the audience on a ride through genres and musical landscapes that emanate from her acoustic and electro-acoustic violin & vocal creations.



 Admission is free! Donations gratefully accepted.

Show: 7-9pm

York Art Association is a non-profit education organization that relys on your generous donations to support its mission of promoting and supporting the arts in York.

The York Art Association values, promotes and supports the visual, performing and literary arts by providing programs and events for the benefit of its members and the community.

Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

*Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: Joyce Anderson Fiddle @ York Art
